name: finagle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to use tricks and dishonest methods to get what you want: He somehow finagled his way into the army as a lieutenant. Synonym
wangle informal

Add to word list
to get something by using an indirect method: [ T ] How can I finagle a place on the guest list for the big party?
